about_the_game:
Naught Nate is a visually stunning and emotionally charged adult visual novel that takes you into the life of Nate, a 21-year-old college student navigating the challenges of adulthood. Struggling to make ends meet, Nate stumbles upon a job at a local cosplay store, a decision that leads him into a world he never imagined. Here, he meets Dia, a captivating and alluring cosplayer who shares more than just her passion for costumes with Nate. As their relationship deepens, Nate finds himself caught in a whirlwind of romance, desire, and erotic experiences.



* Immersive Storytelling: Dive into a deeply engaging narrative that explores the complexities of young adulthood, relationships, and personal growth. Every choice you make shapes Nate's journey, leading to multiple endings.
* Stunning Visuals: Experience beautifully crafted characters and environments that bring the world of cosplay and college life to life.
* Erotic Content: Indulge in explicit and passionate scenes that highlight the intimate relationship between Nate and Dia. This game contains mature content intended for adult audiences only.
* Decision-Based Gameplay: Your choices matter. Determine the direction of Nate's life and relationships through a branching storyline that offers replayability.



Nate is just another college student trying to balance his studies with the pressures of adulthood. Faced with mounting bills and a dwindling bank account, he begins his search for a job, eventually landing at a quirky and vibrant cosplay store. The store is a haven for those passionate about costumes and creativity, and it’s here that Nate encounters Dia—a stunning cosplayer with a personality as colorful as her outfits. As Nate settles into his new role, he and Dia embark on a thrilling and passionate relationship, where boundaries blur, and fantasies become reality.



Nate: A 21-year-old college student who is intelligent, kind-hearted, and a bit naive. Nate’s journey is one of self-discovery as he learns to balance the demands of adulthood, love, and his own desires.

Dia: A 21-year-old cosplayer with a magnetic personality and a secretive past. Dia is both alluring and mysterious, drawing Nate into a world of fantasy and reality. She’s confident, playful, and has a deep passion for her craft.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or may be inappropriate for viewing in the workplace: Rare Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: Naughty Nate : Cosplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Nate starts working as a cashier at a cosplay store to earn money. After meeting a beautiful girl, Nate embarks on an intense and passionate relationship. Naughty Nate invites you into Nate's romantic and erotic adventures.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Thai
